query: { consignments(limit: 2, currentCursor: "consignment-ref3") { pageInfo { startCursor, endCursor, hasNextPage, hasPreviousPage }, edges { node { seriesid, consignmentid, userid, totalFiles, fileChecks { antivirusProgress { filesProcessed }, checksumProgress { filesProcessed }, ffidProgress { filesProcessed }}, parentFolder, transferringBodyName, transferringBodyTdrCode, seriesName, consignmentReference, createdDatetime, transferInitiatedDatetime, exportDatetime files { fileId metadata { clientSideFileSize, clientSideLastModifiedDate, clientSideOriginalFilePath, foiExemptionCode, heldBy, language, legalStatus, rightsCopyright } ffidMetadata { software softwareVersion binarySignatureFileVersion containerSignatureFileVersion method matches { extension identificationBasis puid fileExtensionMismatch formatName } datetime } fileStatuses {fileId statusType statusValue} } consignmentStatuses {consignmentId statusType value createdDatetime }}}}}
